subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: There is a reason the Lakers are apparently unwilling to trade the 7-foot center Andrew Bynum for the most single-minded scorer in the N.B.A. It is called history.
snippet: There is a reason the Lakers are apparently unwilling to trade the 7-foot center Andrew Bynum for the most single-minded scorer in the N.B.A. It is called history.
